QuestionDef.QText: Is this grant a revision?
Select reason(s) for revision
Is this supplement a Diversity Supplement?
Is the parent Program Director recommendation in the file?
Is the Exception form in the file?
Is the supplement funded at a level not to exceed the level specified in 5/14/99 or 4/9/01 Program Announcement?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: Note: Diversity supplements cannot extend beyond the expiration date of the parent grant's current competitive segment.

QuestionDef.QText: Is this the first year of the supplement?
Is the Candidate's support start date the first day of the month in which the Division Approving Official (DAO) signed off on support?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: Note: If No, concurrence memo should be in the file prior to issuance of award.

QuestionDef.QText: Has the greensheet been submitted by the parent grant Program Director?
Is there a separate budget page for the supplement?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: Not needed for a SNAP application.

QuestionDef.QText: Is there a separate progress report for the supplement?
Has the greensheet been submitted by the parent grant Program Director?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: Note: Parent PD greensheet covers both parent grant and diversity supplement.

QuestionDef.QText: Has the Program greensheet for the diversity supplement been reviewed?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: Review to be done by the CMBB Program Director.

QuestionDef.QText: Are the Diversity Supplement terms included on the Notice of Grant Award?
Has the institution received any other Federal support within the past three years?:
Is the 'New Institution' checklist completed?
Explanation required.
Cost principles are:
Funding recommendation; number of slots:
Explanation required.
Does this award include an administrative supplement?
Is the award approved in accordance with the Levels of Authority?
Is there a 'stop notice' for delinquent final reports in the file?
Grant Number(s):
Please check all that apply
Have delinquent reports been obtained?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If No, then a concurrence memo is required for award to be issued.

QuestionDef.QText: Is there substantial foreign involvement?
Has the NIH Form 1820 been received?

SelectionDef.Value: Yes, domestic grant with foreign involvement

QuestionDef.QText: Has the NIH Form 1820 been received?
Is this grant funded with "$50,000 or less" authority?
Is the funding approval documentation in the grant file?
Has CSR received an amendment to this application?
Has an approval been received from the institutional official to inactivate?
Has the application been reviewed?
Is approval for funding in accordance with the 'Levels of Authority' in the file?
Explanation required.
Are Human Subjects involved?
Research exempt from regulations (45 CFR 46)?
Is assurance status okay for all sites engaged in human subjects research?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If No, a signed concurrence memo and special terms are required for the award to be issued.

QuestionDef.QText: Is an expedited IRB review indicated in the applicant's 'just-in-time' documentation?
Does the Program Director concur that an expedited review is acceptable?
Is a full IRB review completed and approval received?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If No, a signed concurrence memo and special terms are required for the award to be issued.

QuestionDef.QText: Is IRB approval date acceptable for award?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If No, a signed concurrence memo and special terms are required for the award to be issued.

QuestionDef.QText: Are any human subjects concerns identified on the summary statement?
Is there OEP concurrence to remove bar in the file?
Has OEP approval to issue a restricted award been received?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: A signed concurrence memo and special terms are required to issue the award.

QuestionDef.QText: Are live vertebrate animals involved?
Is assurance status okay for all sites engaged in animal research?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If No, a signed concurrence memo and OLAW approval is required for award to be issued.

QuestionDef.QText: Is IACUC verification acceptable for award?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If No, a signed concurrence memo and OLAW approval is required for award to be issued.

QuestionDef.QText: Does the file contain any special documentation (e.g. concurrence memo)?
Explanation required.
Is this a provisional award?
Please check all reasons that apply.
QuestionDef.QInstructions: Provide an explanation in the 'Comment' box if Other (End-of-Year) or Other (Non End-of-Year) are selected.

QuestionDef.QText: Are trainee levels, and tuition and fees verified?
Has Post doc tuition been requested?
Has Program recommended for approval?
Are any institutions on the GSA Exclusion list?
Names of institution(s):
Are any institutions on the NEAR list?
Names of institution(s):
Are there any names on the ORI Sanction list?
Names:
Does this research involve Human Embryonic Stem Cells (hESC)?
hESC Lines entered/verified in IMPAC II?
Is this award over 5 Million Total Cost?
Certificate of Filing and Payment of Federal Taxes attached?
Has the PD identified any FCOI Concerns?
Has the concern been resolved?
Explanation required.
Additional comments:
